column4: Hello everybody, i'v got some problem with alacarte, unfortunatly, he is displaying only a part of my GNOME menu so how can I fix it ? (or how can I simply edit my gnome menu)
how can i easly edit a GNOME menu (without alacarte)
depends on which menu i think :P
thats normally generated on the fly from the various .desktop entryies I belive.
